original_text: Instead, each of you should ask your friends, “What is the Lord's answer?” or “What has the Lord said?” Instead, each of you should ask your friends, “What is the Lord's answer?” or “What has the Lord said?”
korean_text: 너희는 서로 이웃과 형제에게 묻기를 여호와께서 무엇이라 응답하셨으며 여호와께서 무엇이라 말씀하셨느냐 하고

sentences.original_text: Instead, each of you should ask your friends
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 각자는 자기 친구들에게 물어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: or What has the Lord said?
Instead, each of you should ask your friends
sentences.korean_translation: 대신 각자는 자기 친구들에게 물어야 합니다

sentences.original_text: or What has the Lord said?
